participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: outgoing and adventurous, loves exploring nature and spending time outdoors.
participant_1.background: i am married to a doctor. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: playful and imaginative, loves singing and has a strong affinity for Disney characters.
participant_2.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i love to go to disney world every year. i play with my friends on the playground. i'm in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character.

content.text:
i like to walk in rainy weather
i am a nature enthusiast
rain is nice . i walk on sunny days .

I get fresh air,
I feed the birds.
i do , i walk a lot , but i do hike , but i do hike .

I like swimming,
watching the sky
i do not have a lot of rain here , i do hike , but i do hike .
i do not have any hobbies , i do hike , but i do hike .
